job_history.work_description: I currently provide feedback, guidance, and direction to 30+ agents in Texas and Arizona offices on a daily basis. I review and research Executive Office complaint responses for compliance and regulatory checks. I identify and work with internal and external LOB partners to obtain thorough resolutions to Executive Office complaints and inquiries.

Advanced to increasingly responsible positions, culminating in a management assistance role with oversight for a 12+ member team. Trained/assisted employees with daily responsibilities and monthly production goals. Handled supervisor talk offs and monitor calls for quality assurance.

Led a team of 12+ Loss Prevention Representatives with a portfolio of 100 to 160 accounts each and days of delinquency ranging from 60- 150 days. I analyzed team and department reports to develop ideas for production and quality enhancement.

I managed and organized maintenance employees and contractors on the premises daily to meet the goals of the business. I implemented employee schedules and organized shifts according to business needs.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including managing teams of 12+ members, providing guidance and direction to agents, and overseeing daily operations, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in providing feedback, guidance, and direction to teams and agents, and has handled supervisor talk offs and monitor calls for quality assurance, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has experience in identifying and resolving complex issues, including Executive Office complaints and inquiries, and has developed ideas for production and quality enhancement, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing and organizing maintenance employees and contractors, and has implemented employee schedules and organized shifts according to business needs, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in managing teams of 12+ members, including training and assisting employees with daily responsibilities and monthly production goals, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Quality Assurance
skills.explanation: Has experience in monitoring calls for quality assurance, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Business Administration
skills.explanation: Has a Bachelor's degree in Business Administration Finance, and has experience in managing daily operations, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Finance
skills.explanation: Has a degree in Business Administration Finance, but limited experience in finance-related roles, suggesting some practical experience.
